originalLintResult.source:
<select name='chart' {{on 'change' this.goToChart}}>
          {{#each this.chartNavigationChoices as |navChoice|}}
            <option
              value='{{navChoice.chart.id}}'
              selected={{if (eq navChoice.chart.id @model.chart.id) 'selected'}}
            >
              {{navChoice.display}}
            </option>
          {{/each}}
        </select>
originalLintResult.message: form elements require a valid associated label.
